app_description: Connect and message with your friends and family.
confirm_delete_paragraph: Deleting can't be undo, take a long breath and think
posts_per_page: Number of posts shown per page.
log_back_in: You need to login back to get access to the content.
require_login_description: Log in first to have access to the app content.
you_are_unauthorized: You are not authorized to view this page.
you_are_unauthorized_description: Only admins can view the dashboard page.

choose_User_to_chat_with: Choose a user to chat with

drop_files_here_description: Attach as many files as you like, each file should not exceed 3mb
confirm_post_delete: Are you absolutely sure?, You can't undo after deleting the post.
post_deleted_successfully_description: You request of deleting the post have been successfully done.
now_works_offline: You can safely use the app offline now.
new_content_available: New content available, click reload to update
